documents.document: Great price and location We spent 3 days in July at the Columbus Motor Inn and found it clean and quiet. Staff very helpful and the location cannot be beat. We asked for a quiet room. It came without a view but it was blissfully quiet! Would definitely stay there again.

Days Inn a great bargain We spent two days in August at this motel and had a very positive experience. $5 daily parking was good. Room was clean and bed extremely comfortable...a king with 4 fluffy pillows. Service good. Coffee in room.
